description: The additonal attributes that describe a person or user beyond those required for a user. These are expected to be used primarily to add additional context for the user_inventory event class.
caption: Person
name: person

created_time.description: The timestamp when the user was created.

labels.description: The labels associated with the user. For example in AD this could be the userType, employeeType. For example: Member, Employee

location.description: The detailed geographical location associated with a user. When used with the user_inventory event class, this typically documents the users usual work location.

modified_time.description: The timestamp when the user entry was last modified
